title: Now showing! Gorgeous 865 Sq Ft 2 bed, 2 bath! Wonderful deal!
posting_body: ['Embarcadero Club', '2210 Sullivan Road', 'College Park, GA 30337', 'A wonderful home in College Park is waiting for you!', 'We currently have a gorgeous 2 bedroom 2 bathroom renting for $1393 per month.', 'This unit comes with 865 sq ft.', 'Embarcadero Club Apartments is in a fabulous location.', 'Not only are we directly on the MARTA bus line, but we are only minutes from Hartsfield Jackson Airport, Clayton State University, Southern Regional Medical, Turner Field and numerous restaurants and retail establishments.', 'We are also just a few miles from major interstates and a short commute to Downtown Atlanta and Henry County.', '2 BD 2 BA 865 SQ FT', 'show contact info', 'Community Highlights:', '❖ 24/7 Emergency Maintenance', '❖ BBQ/Picnic Area', '❖ Cable/Satellite Options:', '6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'Pet Policy:', 'A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet
